title: Boss’s Death Guide - Novel Updates
genre: Action   Adventure   Romance   Sci-fi   Supernatural   Yaoi
tags: Apocalypse   Betrayal   Calm Protagonist   Cannibalism   Clingy Lover   Depression   Devoted Love Interests   Doting Love Interests   Dwarfs   Elemental Magic   Elves   Goddesses   Gods   Handsome Male Lead   Lazy Protagonist   Leadership   Love Interest Falls in Love First   Magic   Male Yandere   Multiple Reincarnated Individuals   Obsessive Love   Power Couple   Revenge   Second Chance   Secret Crush   Strong Love Interests   Suicides   Survival   Tragic Past   Tsundere   Unconditional Love   World Travel   Zombies
author: Jué Jué   决绝
description:
The dark BOSS, who had the fortune of becoming Earth’s last living human, brought with him his loyal little brother, the second last human to die, to be reborn.

What does he want to do after being reborn? Is it world domination or world annihilation?

BOSS expressed, he was completely uninterested in these kinds of things, he only wants to die.

In order for him to make his boss who always seeks death to continue living, little brother is completely unscrupulous, serving his boss to make him comfortable and cozy, then later helplessly discovered…. The BOSS’s behaviour is more and more abnormal!>
